_meta.source: Researched from Shanghai Tourism, TripAdvisor, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers The Bund, Pudong, French Concession, and water towns

transit_routes.name: Shanghai Metro
transit_routes.note: Excellent metro system. English signage throughout. Rush hour crowded.

transit_routes.name: Cruise Terminal Transfer
transit_routes.note: Terminal far from city center. Use ship shuttle or negotiate taxi (insist on meter).

featured_experiences.name: The Bund Evening Walk
featured_experiences.note: Best at sunset when Pudong lights up. 1.5km promenade along Huangpu River.

featured_experiences.name: Shanghai Tower Observation
featured_experiences.note: World's second tallest building. Book ahead for fast pass. Clear mornings best.

featured_experiences.name: Xiaolongbao Experience
featured_experiences.note: Shanghai's signature dish. Multiple Din Tai Fung locations. Arrive early to avoid queues.
